import React from 'react'; import LifeInsuranceCard from './LifeInsuranceCard'; const Hero: React.FC = () => { const products = [ { title: "Health", description: "Stay healthy,\nstay wealthy", icon: "/images/healthcare-icon.png", iconAlt: "Healthcare Icon" }, { title: "Travel", description: "Roam the globe,\nworry-free", icon: "/images/world-icon.png", iconAlt: "World Icon" }, { title: "Motor", description: "Drive with peace\nof mind", icon: "/images/cyber-security-icon.png", // Using placeholder for motor iconAlt: "Motor Insurance Icon" }, { title: "Home", description: "Make your castle\ndisaster-proof", icon: "/images/cyber-security-icon.png", // Using placeholder for home iconAlt: "Home Insurance Icon" }, { title: "Cyber", description: "Protect your\ndigital life", icon: "/images/cyber-security-icon.png", iconAlt: "Cyber Security Icon" } ]; return (
{/* Left Content - Exact positioning from Figma */}
{/* Main Headline */}

Insurance
Minus the
Drama

{/* Subtitle */}

No drama, just coverage that works when life doesn't.

{/* Description */}

IRDAI-approved coverage. Built in Bangalore, trusted nationwide since 2018

{/* CTA Button */}
{/* Right Product Grid - Moved further right and slightly bigger */}
{/* Health Card */}

Health

Stay healthy,
stay wealthy

{/* Life Insurance Card - Using the new component */}
{/* Travel Card */}

Travel

Roam the globe,
worry-free

{/* Motor Card */}

Motor

Drive with peace
of mind

{/* Home Card */}

Home

Make your castle
disaster-proof

{/* Cyber Card */}

Cyber

Protect your
digital life

); }; export default Hero;
